name: RuneShroom
description:
Begin your adventure

Face down hoards of foes as you by navigate a devasted kingdom. With an arsenal of three spells you must navigate the ruined kingdom of your kind and take down the snails resposible for it's down fall. At the end of your journey, you'll discover what has been killing your god, and take it down.

The game features hand drawn special effects and beautiful level art which brings the world to life!

RuneShroom was developed by a Finnish student team.

This game contains themes and mention of death.
